parameters.name: AppId
parameters.description: The ID of the interactive messaging application.

parameters.name: DeviceId
parameters.description: The ID of the device. Each device has a unique ID. You can specify a custom ID. The ID can be up to 64 characters in length and can contain lowercase letters, digits, underscores (\_), and hyphen (-). You can specify multiple device IDs. We recommend that you obtain the IDs from the devices and pass the IDs to the server.

parameters.name: DeviceType
parameters.description:
The type of the device. Valid values:

*   ios
*   android
*   web
*   pc

parameters.name: UserId
parameters.description: The ID of the user. Each user has a unique ID in the application. The ID can be up to 32 characters in length and can contain lowercase letters, digits, underscores (\_), and periods (.). You can specify multiple user IDs.
